title: (x) Iced coffee - Cosmos {Tiff}
content:
Can you please help identify a font:   
 ![icedcoffee.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012040710im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/2857.jpg)

 [‹ Old signs with cool numerals](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012040710/http:/www.typophile.com/node/3544 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Anna Nicole Smith font - Countryhouse {Stephen} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012040710/http:/www.typophile.com/node/3623 "Go to next forum topic")
author: perky

comments.content: Cosmos. I'm not sure if there is an extended version or not. This looks like the stretched the little guy.
Thanks Ill check that font out
Thanks Tiffany,Your a Legend! - It does look like they stretched that font
